title: No… THIS is the CLEANEST Setup
description:
Thanks to LG UltraGear for sponsoring this video! Learn more about the 45GR95QE at: http://bit.ly/3F2DD7u

We’ve made clean setups before but always had to compromise. This time we’ve gone to extreme lengths to make sure unsightly cables are seen on this desktop.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1498715-no%E2%80%A6-this-is-the-cleanest-setup/
